projects.name: Recruitment Management Application

projects.name: Network Security with Linux
projects.description: Conducted independent research on wireless network security using a Linux-based lab environment. Explored techniques for evaluating Wi-Fi password strength and performed controlled simulations of man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks to understand vulnerabilities in data transmission. Analyzed the potential impact of these security risks and studied defensive strategies to strengthen wireless network protection.

projects.name: Machine Translation Project (Transformer & GPT)
projects.description: Designed and implemented an English–Vietnamese machine translation system using the Transformer model and experimented with GPT-based fine-tuning for improved accuracy. The project involved dataset preprocessing, model training on Google Colab with PyTorch, and evaluation of translation quality using BLEU scores to compare model performance.
